column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////So this is one of the first places I took my now hubby about 25 years ago when Cafe Baba Reeba first opened. To this day
column2: the Tapas are fantastic.  We has the Baked goat cheese
column5: the meatballs and the chicken paella all for 2 people and left fat and happy. We will be back!
